component.text: Assigning a Router ID on R2 and R3

component.feedback: ***You must enter the exact and full command.***
component.existingcommands:
• Enter OSPF router configuration mode using process ID 10
  • Assign a Router ID of 2.2.2.2
  • Return to privileged EXEC mode

command.deviceresponse:
R2#
*Mar 25 20:03:56.863: %SYS-5-CONFIG_I: Configured from console by console
R2#
command.instruction: Verify the Router ID within the OSPF protocol settings on R2.

command.deviceresponse:
*** IP Routing is NSF aware ***

Routing Protocol is "ospf 10"
Outgoing update filter list for all interfaces is not set
Incoming update filter list for all interfaces is not set
Router ID 2.2.2.2
Number of areas in this router is 0. 0 normal 0 stub 0 nssa
Maximum path: 4
Routing for Networks:
Routing Information Sources:
Gateway Distance Last Update
Distance: (default is 110)

R2#
command.instruction:
You are now on R3:
  • Enter OSPF router configuration mode using process ID 10
  • Assign a Router ID of 3.3.3.3
  • Return to privileged EXEC mode

command.deviceresponse:
R3#
*Mar 25 20:11:05.415: %SYS-5-CONFIG_I: Configured from console by console
R3#
command.instruction: Verify the Router ID within the OSPF protocol settings on R3.

command.deviceresponse:
*** IP Routing is NSF aware ***

Routing Protocol is "ospf 10"
Outgoing update filter list for all interfaces is not set
Incoming update filter list for all interfaces is not set
Router ID 3.3.3.3
Number of areas in this router is 0. 0 normal 0 stub 0 nssa
Maximum path: 4
Routing for Networks:
Routing Information Sources:
Gateway Distance Last Update
Distance: (default is 110)

R3#
command.instruction: You successfully assigned the Router ID.
